title.narrative: The Accelerator for Agriculture and Agroindustry Development and Innovation Plus for sustainable pineapple value chain development

description.narrative: The pineapple value chain is a priority value chain in the Government of Suriname#s drive to diversify its economy from heavy reliance on the extractive industry. In 2018-2019, in response to a request by the Government of Suriname, FAO, UNIDO and ITC applied the Accelerator for Agriculture and Agroindustry Development and Innovation Plus (3ADI+), a joint value chains and market systems development initiative, to the pineapple sub-sector. Moving from this solid preparatory phase to implementation, the joint programme will foster stakeholder cooperation and engagement and promote SDG-compliant public and private investments in innovation at each value chain stage (i.e. production, processing, and distribution). To assure a long-term sustainability of the action, the technical component will involve a strengthening of the innovative capacities of national institutes and public extension and market promotion services. In sum, the programme represents a unique opportunity to channel investments into productive activities and generate incomes for poor rural communities.
